SELECT COUNT(*) COUNT FROM COMPANY WHERE COMPANY_STATUS = 'Y'

SELECT * FROM ( SELECT ROWNUM RNUM, A.* FROM ( SELECT COMPANY_NO , COMPANY_NAME , COMPANY_ID , COMPANY_PWD , COMPANY_ENROLL FROM COMPANY WHERE COMPANY_STATUS = 'Y' ORDER BY COMPANY_NO DESC ) A ) WHERE RNUM BETWEEN ? AND ?
SELECT COMPANY_NO , COMPANY_NAME , COMPANY_ID , COMPANY_PWD , COMPANY_ENROLL FROM COMPANY WHERE COMPANY_STATUS = 'Y' AND UPPER(COMPANY_NAME) LIKE UPPER('%' || ? || '%') ORDER BY COMPANY_NO DESC
SELECT COMPANY_NO , COMPANY_NAME , COMPANY_ID , COMPANY_PWD , COMPANY_HEAD , COMPANY_COMMENT FROM COMPANY WHERE COMPANY_NO = ?
UPDATE COMPANY SET COMPANY_NAME = ? , COMPANY_ID = ? , COMPANY_HEAD = ? , COMPANY_COMMENT = ? WHERE COMPANY_NO = ?
UPDATE COMPANY SET COMPANY_STATUS = 'N' WHERE COMPANY_NO = ?

SELECT GAME_NO , KOR_NAME , ENG_NAME , TO_CHAR(RELEASE_DATE, 'YY/MM/DD') "RELEASE_DATE" , TO_CHAR(UPLOAD_DATE, 'YY/MM/DD') "UPLOAD_DATE" FROM GAME WHERE GAME_STATUS = 'Y' AND COMPANY_NO = ? ORDER BY GAME_NO DESC
